name: Trapped with A Demon
description:
Summary:

The weather goes bad during your solo camping in the forest.

So you decide to take shelter at a mysterious guy's house that was in the middle of nowhere.  

But this might be your biggest mistake because it can lead you to your death... or maybe not.

.......................................................

Credits:

story+art+music : me

Features:

- This gameplay is 1-hour length

- 7 endings.

- (Ending 2 has two endings: Ending 2a and Ending 2b)

- Each option provides a new bit of dialogue, so be sure to try them all!

- Custom name for the player character

- Original artwork and music

........................................

This visual novel has horror, thriller, and romance depending on how you play.

This is my first VN, hope you like it. 

CONTENT WARNINGS:

It contains sudden imagery, little blood/gore, Screen Shake Effects and Loud noises.
